name: Plane Mechanic Simulator
description: England, 1940. The Luftwaffe is preparing for the invasion of Britain and the RAF need every man to stop it. They need you. Join the ground crews as they struggle to keep the aircraft flying. Repair engine, patch bullet holes, rearm machine guns and more.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel i5 - 4210H (4x 2.9 GHz) or AMD Phenom II X4 980 (4x 3.7 GHz) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 960M (4GB) or Radeon R9 M375X (4GB) Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel i7 3770 (4x 3.4 GHz) or AMD FX-9370 (4x 4.4 GHz) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 660Ti (3GB) or Radeon R9 370 (4GB) Storage: 6 GB available space
